sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Technical Services">6044a2da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb74</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:8544e2da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb43</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OnChange - Check if Account is Internal</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
	var cur_account = g_form.getValue('account');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('Internal_account');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getInternalAccount');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_account', cur_account);
    ga.getXML(getResponse);

    function getResponse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
//             g_form.addInfoMessage('Include answer: ' +answer);
                              
        if (answer == 'true') {
			g_form.setValue('internal_account',"true");
			}
		else {
           g_form.setValue('internal_account',"false");
            }
                              
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cocbom0</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-23 14:14:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf29d20f1ba78950191cd8f99a4bcba1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnChange - Check if Account is Internal</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bf29d20f1ba78950191cd8f99a4bcba1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>cocbom0</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-23 14:14:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
